document.full_text: apple inc and magazine publisher conde nast reached a deal to offer the new yorker on the ipad device in the latest sign that relationships are improving between the technology company and content owners.
document.title: apple, conde nast reach "new yorker" ipad deal
lines_and_colors: apple inc and magazine publisher conde nast reached a deal to offer the new yorker on the ipad device in the latest sign that relationships are improving between the technology company and content owners.
